item.title: About Me
item.description:
Hi! I’m Athul V Anil, a software developer who enjoys creating efficient and intuitive solutions. I’m particularly passionate about using tools like Java, Spring Boot, and AWS to build practical applications and explore innovative approaches, like integrating AI into development workflows.

I love collaborating with others to solve challenging problems and continuously learning about new technologies. Outside of work, I enjoy participating in hackathons, gaming, and playing the guitar. These hobbies fuel my creativity and keep me inspired!

item.title: My Blog Pipeline
item.description:
Here’s how I manage and run this blog:

  1. Obsidian
    Obsidian is my go-to note-taking and writing tool. I use it to draft, organize, and refine all my posts before publishing. Its markdown-based workflow is perfect for my use case such as this website.

  2. Hugo
    Hugo is the static site generator powering this blog. It allows me to convert markdown files into a fast and beautifully designed website with ease.

  3. GitHub
    GitHub serves as my version control and deployment tool. I push my Hugo-generated website to a GitHub repository, which keeps my code and content organized and backed up.
